attributes.action: The fuel prices should go down
attributes.additional_details: If the fuel price goes down, I am hoping the food prices and all other prices would go down
attributes.background: I would really appreciate if the fuel prices goes down as it effects everything thing else and prices for everything is going up due to fuel prices

rejection.details:
The Government isn't directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Halve fuel duty and remove VAT on fuel prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618421

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
